div.div: Thank you for visiting Mobiheal Technologies

Thank you for choosing Mobiheal Technologies for your business solutions. This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you visit our site or use our products and services.

We use your personal information, such as your name, email, address, phone number, mobile number, and website, to alert you about the latest features, product updates, and services. div.div: A cookie is a small software code that our website sends to your browser when you access information on our site. Some pages on our site utilize cookies to enhance your experience and provide personalized content. You have the option to accept or decline cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of certain features on our site.

By using our site and services, you agree to the terms outlined in this privacy policy. Mobiheal Technologies reserves the right to update and modify this policy as needed. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any changes.
If you have any questions or concerns regarding our privacy policy, please contact us at info@mobiheal.tech.
